input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Mini-Factory Pink Strap Charm Lariat Lanyard W/ Lobster Clasp Cords for Cellphone/ USB Drive/ Keychain / DIY Jewelry - Hot Pink(Length:2.8", QTY:200X Pcs)

Product keywords:
Charm Straps for Cellphone, USB Drive, Keychain, Name Tag, Trinkets, Decoration for Handmade Jewelry Accessories.
Lightweight and easy to Connect Cords Strap Lariat Lanyard with Lobster Clasp, easy to attach / detach.
Decorate your Mobile Phone / Camera / iPod / Mp3 / Mp4 / USB Flash Drive with the Colorful Fashionable Straps.
Excellent DIY Accessory String Strap Gift.
Package included 200X Pieces of Hot Pink Strap. Item Size: 2.8".

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
This simple, slim-line checkbook cover and billfold wallet by Paul & Taylor is made out of genuine, quality hand-crafted leather.  Features include carbon copy separator, currency compartment, one additional slot for storage, and a pen holder.  Also includes a pull-out album complete with six card and photo slots.  Keep your checkbook safe and secure with this durable cover wallet.  Available in multiple colors.  Measures approximately 6.75" x 0.2" x 3.5" (17.1cm x 8.9cm x 0.65cm).
Return for any reason for full refund -- no shipping charges. (To process return, go to "Your Orders", start return, print the return shipping label, and ship it back to us.)
input_text.Response B:
Mini-Factory Hot Pink Strap for Mobile Phone / Mp3 / USB Drive / Keychain and more
Durable, Colorful, and Fashionable Charm Straps designed for Cellphones, USB Drives, Keychains, Name Tags, Trinkets, and Decorations for Handmade Jewelry Accessories.
Easy to attach/detach with Lobster Clasp allowing you to easily decorate your Mobile phone/Mp3/Cameras with lightweight and easy-to-connect cords with a lariat lanyard.
Must-Have DIY Accessory Straps for Professional Artists or for a fun gift!
The package includes 200 Pieces of Hot Pink Strap. Item Size: 2.8".
